metadata.title: CVE-2012-6706 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
A VMSF_DELTA memory corruption was discovered in unrar before 5.5.5, asused in Sophos Anti-Virus Threat Detection Engine before 3.37.2 and otherproducts, that can lead to arbitrary code execution. An integer overflowcan be caused in DataSize+CurChannel. The result is a negative value of the"DestPos" variable, which allows the attacker to write out of bounds whensetting Mem[DestPos].

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-6706` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

unrar - 5.5.8-1
No subscription required

libclamunrar7 - 0.99-4ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: unrar-nonfree package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.5.8-1').
libclamunrar package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.99-4ubuntu1').
